Name: Superman II The Richard Donner Cut Blu-ray

Titles.Comment: SUPERMAN II- THE RICHARD DONNER CUT.mkv

Item.Title: Deleted Scenes
Item.Description: Six wisely trimmed deleted scenes are included: "Lex and Ms. Teschmacher Head North," "Lex and Ms. Teschmacher Head South," "The Villains Enter the Fortress," "He's All Yours Boys," "Clark and Jimmy" and "Lex's Getaway."

Chapters.Title: Lex and Mx. Teschmacher Head North
Lex and Ms. Tecchmacher Head South

Item.Title: Superman II: Restoring the Vision
Item.Description: "When I look at it now, I like it, but I'm a little embarrassed by things. But I have to take myself back twenty-five years and see it, why I did it then and how I did it then, not knowing what I know now." A more in-depth look at the lengths to which Donner and his team went to reconstruct The Richard Donner Cut, as well as the challenges they faced along the way.

Titles.Comment: SUPERMAN II- THE RICHARD DONNER CUT.mkv

Item.Title: Introduction by Richard Donnor
Item.Description: "I just got a kick out of seeing it, something I never thought would happen. It was quite emotional, quite exciting." Donner appears in an introduction to the film, touching on the work that went into restoring his cut of Superman II.
